description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission reference 213089 granted 30/11/2021 to change the wording of the description omitting the storey number. Approved description:  Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) attached to planning permission reference 202337 dated 14-04-2021 for “Construction of a five-storey building to rear to provide 18 supported living units (Sui Generis) to operate in connection with 4 Gainsborough Road with associated works including refuse and cycle storage facilities”. Amendments include 1) Construction of five-storey extension to southeast elevation with obscured glazed windows. 2) Installation of a new entrance door to northeast elevation. Proposed description:  Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) attached to planning permission reference 202337 dated 14-04-2021 for “Construction of a building to rear to provide 18 supported living units (Sui Generis) to operate in connection with 4 Gainsborough Road with associated works including refuse and cycle storage facilities”. Amendments include 1) Construction of extension to southeast elevation with obscured glazed windows. 2) Installation of a new entrance door to northeast elevation
